title: Stocks tumble as rising costs leave investors feeling dizzy
text:
Stocks tumble as rising costs leave investors feeling dizzy 3:45am IST - 01:57 
Wall Street investors had the wind knocked out of them by the combination of the highest benchmark interest rate in four years, rising corporate costs, and worries about high-flying tech stocks.   
Wall Street investors had the wind knocked out of them by the combination of the highest benchmark interest rate in four years, rising corporate costs, and worries about high-flying tech stocks.  //reut.rs/2FbPkqI
